Pre-Game Insights: Canada vs. Argentina is the first match of Copa América 2024 and the most difficult test for Canada.
Argentina is ranked first in the world and has been undefeated for over a year, winning their last five matches.
21 of Argentina's current squad members were at the World Cup in Qatar, including their entire starting XI from the final.
Canada’s coaching staff, including Jesse Marsch, acknowledges the difficulty of the match but views it as a learning opportunity.
